data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Napoli.
In the minute 1, Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Attention is being given to Milan’s Simon Kjaer and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Milan at Stadio San Paolo.
Simon Kjaer has recovered and rejoins the match in Naples.
Milan drives forward and Ante Rebic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 9, Paolo Valeri signals a Milan throw-in in Napoli's half.
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 10, Milan's Simon Kjaer breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Milan to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In Naples Milan attack through Alexis Saelemaekers. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Milan.
In the minute 16, Tiemoue Bakayoko (Napoli) has received a yellow card from Paolo Valeri.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Napoli have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Milan.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
Goal! A Zlatan Ibrahimovic header gives Milan a 0-1 lead in Naples.
In the minute 20, Theo Hernandez with an assist there.
Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Milan's half.
Napoli have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Milan's area.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Dries Mertens of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Important block from the Milan defence as Tiemoue Bakayoko fires in a strike for Napoli.
In the minute 28, Napoli apply pressure at Stadio San Paolo and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Giovanni Di Lorenzo but the strike hits the bar!
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 29, In Naples Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic is caught offside.
Napoli's Giovanni Di Lorenzo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In Naples, Dries Mertens of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Milan at Stadio San Paolo.
Matteo Politano for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Paolo Valeri awards Milan a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Milan push forward at Stadio San Paolo and Davide Calabria gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Napoli defence.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Milan.
In the minute 35, Napoli's Matteo Politano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Milan have a goal kick.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 37, Can Napoli capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Napoli are coming forward and Kostas Manolas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Napoli's Hirving Lozano breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Milan at Stadio San Paolo.
In the minute 41, Napoli are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Napoli's Mario Rui misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 43, Paolo Valeri awards Milan a goal kick.
Paolo Valeri waits before resuming play because Franck Kessie for Milan is still down.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Milan’s Franck Kessie is on his feet again at Stadio San Paolo.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ismael Bennacer for Milan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
Paolo Valeri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Stadio San Paolo.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Free kick Napoli.
In the minute 47, Davide Calabria is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Napoli in the half of Milan.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kalidou Koulibaly is back on the pitch.
In the minute 51, Play has been interrupted briefly in Naples to check on Kalidou Koulibaly, who is grimacing with pain.
Napoli to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 54, Matteo Politano (Napoli) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Milan take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
Ante Rebic instrumental with a fine assist.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Napoli make their first substitution with Piotr Zielinski replacing Hirving Lozano.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Giovanni Di Lorenzo (Napoli) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Paolo Valeri awards Milan a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ante Rebic (Milan) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 60, Paolo Valeri blows against Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic for offside.
Dries Mertens keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
Napoli needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Napoli.
Tiemoue Bakayoko (Napoli) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 66, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Milan's Ismael Bennacer gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Napoli defender.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Milan push forward at Stadio San Paolo and Simon Kjaer gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Napoli defence.
In the minute 69, Gennaro Gattuso is making the team's second substitution at Stadio San Paolo with Andrea Petagna replacing Matteo Politano.
In the minute 70, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milan's Ante Rebic is whistled for offside at Stadio San Paolo.
In the minute 73, Napoli's Andrea Petagna has run offside.
Samu Castillejo is on a sub for Alexis Saelemaekers for Milan.
Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a second substitution, with Jens Hauge replacing Ante Rebic.
In the minute 75, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Milan.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Naples.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Franck Kessie (Milan) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 77, In Naples, Fabian Ruiz of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Throw-in Napoli.
In the minute 78, Zlatan Ibrahimovic is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The away team has substituted Zlatan Ibrahimovic with Lorenzo Colombo. Stefano Pioli is thus making his third change.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Mario Rui (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Free kick Napoli.
In the minute 85, Samu Castillejo (Milan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
The away team replace Hakan Calhanoglu with Rade Krunic.
In the minute 88, Napoli's Fabian Ruiz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Milan have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Naples.
Milan are pushing forward but Samu Castillejo's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Milan pushes forward through Lorenzo Colombo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Milan drive upfield and Jens Hauge gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Napoli defender.
Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Andrea Petagna of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Milan's Franck Kessie is back in action after a slight knock.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Milan's half.
Napoli's Dries Mertens is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
Eljif Elmas is replacing Fabian Ruiz for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Franck Kessie for Milan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
It's now 1-3 in Naples as Jens Hauge scores for Milan.
Great play from Ismael Bennacer to set up the goal.
